formula_reasoning: Easily trainable dogs are those with high trainability and low dominance; high trainability means the breed learns commands easily, while low dominance reduces the likelihood of stubborn or challenging behavior. This combination is especially important for first-time dog owners or those seeking a dog that's simple to manage.
